title: Yoshichron
author: Yoshichron
created_time: May 11, 2023, 11:32:47 PMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 11:19:03 PM by Yoshichron
content: üê¶ Introducing Tweetcoin ($TWEETY) - Embrace Decentralization and Financial Freedom üê¶üåê ONLY ON BINANCE SMART CHAIN üåêExperience the power of Tweetcoin exclusively on the Binance Smart Chain, as we firmly believe it offers the optimal infrastructure for $TWEETY. While we're committed to BSC, we keep an open mind about potential listings on other chains in the future. Stay tuned to our official channels for updates.üîí SECURITY FIRST üîíRest assured knowing that Tweetcoin's smart contract is meticulously designed to safeguard every holder's investment. Our advanced security protocols effectively thwart malicious bots, ensuring a fair distribution and protecting against pump-and-dump schemes. Invest with confidence!üöÄ A NEW ERA OF DECENTRALIZATION üöÄTweetcoin emerges as a symbol of financial freedom and a catalyst for true decentralization. Our mission is to empower the community, embracing the principles of transparency and innovation.üîë Tokenomics Overview:- Token Supply: 10,000,000,000,000 (no tax)- Contract Renouncement: Granting complete control to the community, fostering true decentralization- Liquidity Pool: 80% of the tokens are sent to the liquidity pool, ensuring stability and liquidity for the $TWEETY ecosystem.- Reserved Supply: The remaining 20% of the supply is held in a secure smart contract, exclusively reserved for centralized exchange listings, bridges, future liquidity pools and out TweetToEarn program.üí• BURNED LIQUIDITY üí•In pursuit of fairness and liquidity stability, we'll burn the LP tokens upon launch. This step ensures that the initial pool remains intact and prevents anyone from withdrawing liquidity.üíº Tweetcoin is governed by the community, devoid of a centralized team. Our moderators and administrators are active contributors and token holders, just like you.üåê Explore and Connect:- Official Website- Tweetcoin Telegram- Tweetcoin Twitter- Yoshiki on Twitter- Yoshiki's Medium- Contact Yoshiki on TelegramLaunch 01-07-2023Join our journey toward true decentralization and financial freedom!‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer: Conduct thorough research and exercise caution when investing in cryptocurrencies. ‚ö†Ô∏è

comments.body: Here is our new medium post: https://yoshichron.medium.com/the-humble-traveler-shaping-the-future-of-cryptocurrency-6ebf501f97e8

comments.author: Yoshichron
comments.body: We are currently developing a bot that tracks all Twitter activity related to Tweetcoin. Once a week, users who have registered and meet the criteria for active participation will be automatically rewarded with Tweetcoin. More information about the functionality will be announced. We will delay launch until this bot is finished.Regards,Yoshiki

comments.body: We're now live on Pancakeswap!!Chart can be found here:https://www.dextools.io/app/en/bnb/pair-explorer/0xa000005711fe665b7bdaee2a9df41cae05dfb6dfOur token address:https://bscscan.com/token/0x2740f7246d40a730022f6f7376f9afd77090fd3e#balancesTweetToEarn contract:https://bscscan.com/address/0x08bceaf02220c801d20beebaf590ff5b7c3f9c2bCurrently 8/8 tax, but will soon be reduced to zero!
